metadata.name: "We Will Rise"
metadata.description: The roaring rise against tyranny, against the loss of freedoms, against suppression. We rise so we can create a decentralized more inclusive world for all. Together, We Will Rise.
metadata.YOU: YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR WAR,  AND GUILTY FOR ITS CRIMES, NOT EVEN A MILLION PRAYERS, WILL CLEAR YOU FOR THEIR LIVES, IT IS YOU THAT NEED TO WAKE, TO STOP THE BLEEDING, THAT IS THE WORLD TODAY, BECAUSE THE CLOCK KEEPS TICKING, AND ALREADY SOMEWHERE IT IS TOO LATE, SO LET’S UNITE TOGETHER, AND PUT AN END TO ALL THIS MESS, BECAUSE ONE DAY YOU WILL AWAKE, AND YOU’LL REGRET THAT IT IS TOO LATE, IT IS NOW THAT YOU MUST RISE,TO LOOK THIS WAY AND JOIN THE FIGHT, THE FIGHT FOR FREEDOM AND PURE WHITE LIGHT,  TO KEEP EVOLVING INTO ETERNAL LIFE.

attributes.value: 18 x 24 in Mixed Media (Oil, Acrylic, Gouache, Charcoal) on Cold Pressed Paper
Physical piece can be redeemed by the first owner that holds the NFT piece for 1 year
